channel.title: Basiux's play escape - a new attempt for meeting up with people, now using a theatrical game as a plot device
channel.description:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/458af3zdbjvd5cv/2016-01-31%2017.32.46-1.jpg?dl=1
still need to merge the ai-poca-lips universe into a story for the first event (which shall be repeated until people ask for a new one) and make a better page explaining what it's all about and how it's still an experiment... but other than that, come in join us at lx (lisbon)!
